roleset.name: hold, brandish
roleset.note: WIELD-V NOTES: Verbnet class hold-15.1, other members include 'hold'. (from wield.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: ...of the power that-2 [Dorrance family members]-1 intend *trace*-1 to wield *trace*-2 in reshaping the troubled food company.
example.arg: in reshaping the troubled food company

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG3
example.text: What people admired most about Wang was his ability to wield the knife like a writing brush , carving lines that seemed free and flowing .
example.arg: carving lines that seemed free and flowing
